entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.87.2
entry.content:
• 🎨 Updated Source to v1.3.1 - Ghost CI
  • 🎨 Updated Casper to v5.7.4 - Ghost CI
  • 🐛 Removed method="post" on sign in/up forms in Admin (#20598) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed image dimension retrieval causing Ghost requests to hang (#20589) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed data importer allowing invalid free product to be imported (#20572) - Michael Barrett
  • 🐛 Fixed offer redemptions for free members redeeming an offer (#20571) - Chris Raible
  • 🐛 Fixed pasting product URLs into the editor (#20565) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed member source attribution for sign-up (Portal) links (#20566) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed selection bugs in editor (#20557) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed bad redirects yaml overriding backed up working yaml file (#20555) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.87.1...v5.87.2
